featured.text: It was a thin gold chain with a heart dangling on it and Amy loved it the minute she saw it.
Sea life can get sucked into desalination plants, killing small ocean creatures like baby fish and plankton, upsetting the food chain.
Chains have emerged in Taiwan, Singapore, and even on resort islands like Bali.
Instead of the traditional bare pod-sized style, new chains now feature interior design that appeals to digitally connected travelers from around the world.

definition.zh_def: 鏈條；一系列相連的事物或事件
definition.en_def: A series of connected links or a sequence of events or items.
definition.example: She wore a beautiful silver chain around her neck.
